overview:
Michael De Monte is a founder and Chief Executive Officer of ScribbleLive, a groundbreaking content delivery platform that gives the new web generation what they want â€“ news now.

He has been in the New Media business since 1983. During the last 15 years, he has worked as a Project Manager and was last employed by Canadaâ€™s largest broadcaster as Director of On-line Production. While leading a team of designers and developers to keep hundreds web sites active and up-to-date, Michael became central to all strategic planning initiatives for the web and gained important insight into the business of delivering real-time content.

Today, ScribbleLive is partnered with Rogers Ventures and has become the preeminent live content management system for media and news organizations. His web start-up has been named â€œthe future of online journalismâ€ by The National Post and has broken new ground in content delivery software.
